Orthomosaics

Georeferenced aerial maps stitched from overlapping images with sub-centimeter GSD (Ground Sample Distance). Perfect for site planning, progress tracking, and volumetric analysis.

Supported Data Formats

All deliverables are compatible with industry-standard CAD, GIS, and BIM platforms including AutoCAD, ArcGIS, Pix4D, DroneDeploy, and more.

TIF
Georeferenced raster format with spatial reference data
LAS
Standard point cloud format, uncompressed
LAZ
Compressed point cloud format, smaller file size
XYZ
ASCII point cloud format for universal compatibility
OBJ
3D mesh format for visualization and CAD import
DXF
AutoCAD drawing format for design integration
DWG
AutoCAD native format for professional workflows
PDF
Portable document format for reports and presentations
3D PDF
Interactive 3D models embedded in PDF documents
CSV
Spreadsheet format for data analysis and calculations
JPEG
Compressed image format for quick sharing and viewing
MP4
Video format for time-lapse and progress documentation
